org.dellroad.msrp

Interface FailureListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReportListener

    public interface FailureListener
extends ReportListener
    Callback interface for MSRP failure reports.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reportFailure(Session session, String messageId, Status status)
      Receive report of failed message transmission.

    • Method Detail

      • reportFailure

        void reportFailure(Session session,
                 String messageId,
                 Status status)
        Receive report of failed message transmission.
        Parameters:
        session - session on which the message was transmitted
        messageId - ID of message
        status - failure status
